title: Streetheart - One Night One Take
description:
One Night One Take is a release from Streetheart's original founding members Kenny Shields, Paul Dean, Spider Sinnaeve, Matt Frenette and Daryl Gutheil. This set of recordings from their 1993 reunion tour features tracks from their classic album "Meanwhile Back In Paris" along with some of the legendary covers they were famous for.  Also featured on 1N1T are two previously unreleased tracks, the powerful "Mr. Tall", featuring Matt and Spider on an extended solo, and "Losing Streak", which was recorded during the original Meanwhile sessions. A brilliant and raw tour de force from one of the greatest R&R lineups to ever hit the stage.  A must for every Streetheart fan and music aficionado.

1. Action
2. Look At Me
3. Streetwalker
4. Under My Thumb
5. Mr. Tall
6. Can You Feel It
7. Move On Over
8. Here Comes The Night
9. Pressure
10. Just For You
11. Losing Streak

All tracks are 320 kps mp3
